title: 2D Platformer - Audio Pack
description: 100 + Audio Files for your 2D Platform Game
longDescription:
Hi there!


That's my 2D Platformer audio pack, here you'll find sounds that I think maybe useful on a platform game.Â 

Like a lever, a switch, a sword, small creatures, fanfares, bows, jump, and others.


Here's the full list:


  • Collect_Coin_01
  • Collect_Coin_02
  • Collect_Coin_03
  • Fanfare_Defeat_01
  • Fanfare_Defeat_02
  • Fanfare_Defeat_03
  • Fanfare_Victory_01
  • Fanfare_Victory_02
  • Fanfare_Victory_03
  • Fire_Ball_01
  • Fire_Ball_02
  • Fire_Ball_03
  • Fire_Burning_01
  • Hit_Arrow_01
  • Hurt_01
  • Hurt_02
  • Hurt_03
  • Jump_01
  • Level_Up_01
  • Level_Up_02
  • Level_Up_03
  • Lever_01
  • Lever_02
  • Little_Sword_01
  • Little_Sword_02
  • Little_Sword_03
  • Pet_01
  • Pet_02
  • Pet_03
  • Pistol_01
  • Pistol_02
  • Puff_01
  • Puff_02
  • Puff_03
  • Secret_Area_01
  • Secret_Area_02
  • Shot_Arrow_01
  • Switch_01
  • Treasure_Chest_01
  • Treasure_Chest_02


Check the preview

Check the documentation


Except for the fanfares, all files comes with 2 variations that you're getting for free :)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 108

Number of Audio Cues: 108

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) Only the "Fire Burning" sound

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Check the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: The background snow image is created by Dusan Pavkovic, and the font used is "Jungle Fever" free distributed by 1001 fonts for commercial use.
